title: Is Arclight Vayne Getting Sound Effects For Her Auto Attack And W Passive?

replies.body:
No. Everything she has is here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNf0ZJuaDtw

Arclight Vayne will be 975 RP* and includes:

New model and texture!
New particles!
New SFX on her (R) and recall!
New recall animation!
Beat me to it! This is correct!

Is she ever going to get a skin that changes the sound of her AA projectiles? This is like a wet dream for ADCs.Autoattack sound plays a major role in an ADCs identity and it would be nice to have a change after 4~ years or so.(vayne release)
